project-description_metagenome_name: NON Crocosphaera watsonii bloom - 4/12/07 Net Collected Trichodesmium Sample 1
sample-isolation-and-treatment_sample_is: Seawater samples were collected using 8 × 10 l Niskin bottles that were triggered at the sampling depth and returned to the research vessel. Both daytime and nighttime samples were collected into into acid-washed and seawater-rinsed polycarbonate bottles of varying  volumes. Water for DNA and RNA samples was filtered using peristaltic-pump-driven positive-pressure filtration serially through 10 μm polycarbonate (GE Osmonics, Trevose, PA, USA) and 0.2 μm Supor (Pall Gelman, Ann Arbor, MI, USA) filters. For RNA, 3 l were filtered, and the filters were placed immediately into microcentrifuge tubes containing 100 μl glass beads and 350 μl RLT buffer (RNEasy kit, Qiagen, Valencia, CA, USA). Samples for DNA (4 l) were filtered per the RNA samples and placed into microcentrifuge tubes containing 200 μl TE buffer. The filters were then frozen in liquid nitrogen for transport to the laboratory at the University of California Santa Cruz.
sequences_sequences_filtered: Sequences with <99% similarity and E-values >10−20 to the genome contigs were discarded
